title: JBL Bluetooth Speaker Flip-6 Black
summary: The beat goes on with a 2-way speaker system engineered to deliver powerful sound with low frequencies while a separate tweeter produces crisp, clear high-frequencies
Don’t sweat the small stuff like charging your battery because the JBL Flip 6 gives you up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge, so you can keep the party going longer
Whether you're hanging out at the park, relaxing on the beach or lounging by the pool, the IP67 waterproof and dustproof design means you can bring your speaker anywhere
A versatile design means you can stand the Flip 6 vertically or horizontally and loud JBL Original Pro Sound offers a truly immersive listening experience wherever you go

title: Altec Lansing Jacket H20 Bluetooth Speaker IMW457
summary: Certified IP67 rated: Waterproof, Shockproof, Sandproof, Everything proof. We engineered the IMW457 to withstand the toughest of environments. The extremely durable design also enables it to float on water
The party never stops with the IMW457. It is engineered with a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery to deliver your music for up to 8 hours on a single charge
The IMW457 comes built with a high-performance microphone and voice confirmation to easily manage your phone calls. With just a simple touch of a button, you can answer calls in crisp, clear quality

It may be small in size, but the IMW457 is packed with large dynamic drivers to deliver full-spectrum audio in a wide listening area. It is fully compatible with most devices with a 3.5mm auxiliary input for expandable audio options

title: Altec Lansing Baby Boom Bluetooth Speaker W269N Blue
summary: Deep & Rich Bass Audio: If you’re looking for a mini Bluetooth speaker that’s compact but packs a big punch then you’ve found it. Our Bluetooth outdoor speaker is compact but delivers deep bass and crystal clear audio to boost your music enjoyment

Dont Fear The Water: Whether it’s a picnic or a party by the poolside, you can count on our portable wireless speakers to keep the party going! Our loud Bluetooth speakers are waterproof, snowproof, and float when dropped in water

For All Outdoor Trips: Thanks to the compact size coupled with the lightweight and sturdy build, our portable wireless Bluetooth speaker is perfect for all your trips, travels, and outdoor activities to bring you sound that satisfies and bass the booms

USB Rechargeable Battery: Equipped with a built-in rechargeable battery, our small Bluetooth speaker provides up to 6 hours of interrupted music! It can be recharged through any USB outlet including laptops, wall outlets, power banks, and more

Just Pair & Play: We use Bluetooth technology to maintain a stable connection up to 100 feet without any distortions. You can pair this Bluetooth speaker with almost any smartphone, tablet, PC, laptop, etc. It’s compatible with both Android and IOS devices
